title: BIM Integration Training Program for Interior Design Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Enhancing project integration management capabilities through BIM technology for beginner-level learners performing administrator/leader roles

learning_goals: Applying the 3-stage (cognitive-associative-autonomous) learning model of ACT-R theory enables performing basic Revit software functions with 80% accuracy
Design errors can be reduced by over 30% through spatial configuration simulation and clash detection using BIM models
Three or more sustainability elements for interior projects can be derived by conducting BIM-based lifecycle analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
